content:
During the upcoming DevDays in Boston, I will be giving an overview and introduction into FHIR profiling:
http://www.fhirdevdays.com/boston/schedule/#event-2
I'm also looking into doing some hands-on profiling, provided there is sufficient interest from the participants.
For example, participants can bring concrete use cases and we'll look into it together.
Please let me know if you would like to participate, and maybe describe your use case if possible.

For attendees of the Boston FHIR DevDays: I'm seeking additional volunteers wishing to participate on the Tools-presentation session (a series of 8-minute talks), see https://www.fhirdevdays.com/boston/schedule/#event-42 - please contact me via private message (not on this forum) for details and/or to get hold of a time slot.
Hey, finances and timing all worked out, and I’m on a train to Boston with use cases in hand. Happy to discuss/volunteer profiling, tooling, etc.
That's great - but more appropriate for #social :) Safe travels
